subject: EXCEPTION_FLT_UNDERFLOW with JUnit and JNI
msgSnippet: Hello, everytime I try to run a unit test doing some JNI calls I run into the following exception. The -noloading option seems to have no impact. Has anybody
messageBody:
Hello,

everytime I try to run a unit test doing some JNI calls
I run into the following exception. The -noloading option
seems to have no impact.

Has anybody else also experienced this kind of error?
If yes - any hints are greatly appreciated.

We use JDK 1.4.1_01 with JUnit 3.8.1.

Torsten Mueller
e-Mail: Torsten.MuellerX@...


Exception trace:

Unexpected Signal : EXCEPTION_FLT_UNDERFLOW occurred at PC=0x6D33B95B
Function=[Unknown.]
Library=C:\j2sdk1.4.0_02\jre\bin\client\jvm.dll

NOTE: We are unable to locate the function name symbol for the error
just occurred. Please refer to release documentation for
